page.title: 03FRON ISA AND FRON UCHA
page.content: THESE ARE TWO VERY SMALL HAMLETS AT THE VERY FOOT OF THE BERWYN HILLS. ALL THE HOUSES ARE VERY OLD,NO-ONE IS ALLOWED TO BUILD NEW HOUSES THERE BECAUSE IT WOULD SPOIL THE APPEARANCE. THE HOUSES LOOK OLD, THOUGH THEY ARE IN GOOD CONDITION. INSIDE THEY HAVE LOTS OF EXPOSED BEAMS AND THINGS LIKE THAT BECAUSE THEIR OWNERS THINK THAT GIVES THEM CHARACTER.A CRAFT SHOP HAS JUST OPENED UP IN AN OLD BARN IN FRON UCHA, BUT WE DONT THINK IT WILL DO MUCH TRADE BECAAUSE IT IS ABOUT ONE MILE OFF THE A5 UP ONE WINDING LANE AND A STEEP HILL. BUT THERE ARE LOTS OF TOURSITS TRAVELLING ON THE A5 AND LOTS OF THEM LIKE CRAFT THINGS AND ANTIQUES SO WE MIGHT BE WRONG.THE HAMLETS ARE ALL RIGHT IN SUMMER BUT WE DONT LIKE THEM IN WINTER.
